description: Erection of single-storey rear and first floor rear extensions, 2no side dormer roof extensions to facilitate loft conversion. Associated changes to fenestration.
decision_conditions: By reason of the siting, bulk and design, the proposed side dormer roof extensions would appear an incongruous addition to the original dwelling and the immediate streetscene, thereby conflicting with Policies D3 of the London Plan 2021, Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's Core Strategy 201 and Policy Guidance 39 of the Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames Residential Design Guide SPD.

By reason of its scale and depth, the proposed two storey rear extension and dormer roof extensions, would adversely impact the amenities of the neighbouring properties at both adjoining dwellings at No.41 and No.45 Malvern Road by reason of an unacceptable overbearing impact, increase in the sense of enclosure and loss of outlook to the adjoining properties. The proposal is therefore contrary to policies D3 of the London Plan 2021, policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

By reason of its scale and depth, the proposed two storey rear extension and proposed dormers, would adversely impact the amenities of the neighbouring property at No.41 Malvern Road by reason of loss of daylight and direct sunlight to the adjoining property No.41 Malvern Road. The proposal is therefore contrary to policies D3 of the London Plan 2021, policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
